item.description:
Friday Night Girls Night Out!

Free party, free stuff, free food, what is not to love!

Let's get together so some socializing, networking and just plain unwinding on a Friday night.

We have a private room at Vlora Restaurant on Boyston St. in Boston. This is super easy to get to! Vlora has a beer/wine bar and fantastic sangria! They are also providing us with FREE appetizers.

Free samples from Votre Vu cosmetics for the first to arrive! Plus EXTRA SPECIAL giveaways all night!

Lounge music provided by DJ Farhan of Synergy Events!

Do invite your best friends and co-workers! This is a free event! Find it on Facebook and Going.com too!

We'll head out to a club afterwords....discount/free admission to a club (TBD) for those who attend this party!

Email/call me if you have any questions or suggestions on how to make this a great night!
item.name: Girls Night Out!
